verses.text: For the end, among the Hymns of David.
O God, hearken to my petition; Attend to my prayer.
From the ends of the earth have I cried to thee, When my heart was in trouble: Thou liftedst me up on a rock, Thou didst guide me:
because thou wert my hope, A tower of strength from the face of the enemy.
I will dwell in thy tabernacle forever; I will shelter myself under the shadow of thy wings. Pause.
For thou, O God, hast heard my prayers; Thou hast given an inheritance to them that fear thy name.
Thou shalt add days to the days of the king; \add Thou shalt lengthen\add* his years to all generations.
He shall endure forever before God: Which of them will seek out his mercy and truth?
So will I sing to thy name forever and ever, That I may daily perform my vows.
